content.prompt: Which of the following legislative acts best relates to the passage?

choices.label: Title IX of the Education Amendments Act of 1972
The Bipartisan Campaign Reform Act of 2002
The Gun-Free School Zones Act of 1990

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the argument or perspective in the source may affect political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
